inlinePayload.name: search_needs_by_keyword
inlinePayload.description: Search for needs by keyword. Searches across multiple fields including title, description, role name, company, and city. Returns up to 100 matching needs with full details.

query.description: Search keyword or phrase (e.g., 'Python developer', 'Senior manager', 'Milano'). Case-insensitive search across title, description, role, company, and location.
